name: RecursiveResourceCalculator
title: Recursive Resource Calculator
author: Herddex
description: An in-game calculator, opened with ALT + C by default, which can be used to automatically compute the information you need to build a final product at a given rate of production: precise number of machines for each intermediate product, required production rates for all said intermediate products, approximate pollution and energy costs, with options for specifying module configurations, as well as machine types.
